author: mrglavas
msg: Once the LSSerializer (or XMLSerializer) has completed serializing the DOM drop internal references to the nodes from the Document. If the application is pooling serializers this will allow the garbage collector to reclaim the Document and all of its nodes if the application no longer has any references to it.

author: mrglavas

author: aconway
msg: Fix missing source files in distribution.

author: sebb
msg: <note> and <type> no longer work as tags; replace with <h3> and <source> respectively
